channel.title: How do I see this file?
channel.description:
Here is a picture, I know its a virus, how do I see it. AVG isnt picking it up.
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/ebehq0.png[/img]

item.title: How do I see this file?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:10, topic:283427”][quote author=nicatron link=topic=374534.msg2824979#msg2824979 date=1244906123]
Just get a decent AV and your set if your already careful.
[/quote]
Or just don’t be a complete dumbass.
Or just use Linux.[/quote]
+1

Read full topic

item.title: How do I see this file?
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:5, topic:283427”]Well doing what T4_ worked I knew about folder options but I thought showing Hidden Files was all I needed. I uploaded it to online but it DrWeb was the only one that detected anything. Trojan if it infects my computer with any more shit. I will fuck up the guys website that was hosting it, seeing that he has a major vulnerability. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2009, 06:07:29 pm[/size][hr][quote author=sppt link=topic=374534.msg2824184#msg2824184 date=1244851572]
Well, if you can’t see that, you’re probably infected with some virus/malware anyway…
[/quote]

No t4_ had it right I haven’t had a virus in forever. I actually self inflicted this one on myself. Im usually careful about what I download but this time I was pretty sure it was a virus.[/quote]

Who in their right mind installs a working virus on their main box? Just get a decent AV and your set if your already careful.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I see this file?

item.title: How do I see this file?
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Use KillBox in safemode. If you need directions on how to use that, PM me. If KillBox doesn’t work you’ll want to use combofix.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I see this file?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

the bank:

Delete it with the command line…

First close the process and then delete from cmd. If you cant close the process get a Linux Live CD!

Linux Live CDs solve most of life’s problems

Read full topic
